name: extensionList
description: This function returns a query object containing a list of installed extensions. It takes no arguments.

lucee.notes: This function was added as part of the Admin Interface improvement.

examples.title: Simple ExtensionList() Example
examples.description: This example shows a very basic usage of the function to get a list of available extensions.

examples.title: Complex ExtensionList() Example
examples.description: This example was created by Michael Born to check the version of an installed extension.
